remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供对使用时进行模糊处理法律义务许可的专有字体。The method is provided for use when you are legally obligated to obfuscate licensed proprietary fonts. 虽然此方法不提供加密，方法可用来抑制解压缩专有用户[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体和用于其他用途单独安装。While this method does not provide encryption, the method can be used to inhibit users from unzipping proprietary [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts and installing them separately for other uses. 有关字体模糊处理的详细信息，请参阅部分 2.1.7.3"嵌入字体模糊处理"中*XML 纸张规范 (XPS)*下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
